entry.title: Diversity Talk: Winning your way through Tech Conferences and Grants
Behind the Scenes of Spell Checks!
entry.summary:
Description

Ever missed rectifying a spelling mistake in an important email but were super relieved that it got auto-corrected? Let’s understand what happens under the hood. This talk introduces the algorithm behind handling typos, the various Natural Language Processing techniques available and how you can tweak them for your …
entry.content:
Description

Ever missed rectifying a spelling mistake in an important email but were super relieved that it got auto-corrected? Let’s understand what happens under the hood. This talk introduces the algorithm behind handling typos, the various Natural Language Processing techniques available and how you can tweak them for your use-case!
